**2023-07-19 / @aclements, @adonovan, @andybons, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @rolandshoemaker, @rsc**

**Discussions (not yet proposals)**

- **codereview: should the Go project stop importing GitHub PRs?** [#61182](https://go.dev/issue/61182)
- **math/rand/v2: a new API for math/rand and a first v2 for std** [#60751](https://go.dev/issue/60751)
- **net/http: move HTTP/2 into the standard library** [#60746](https://go.dev/issue/60746)

**Accepted**

- **cmd/go: support vendoring in workspace mode** [#60056](https://go.dev/issue/60056)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **regexp/syntax: accept (?<name>...) in addition to (?P<name>...)** [#58458](https://go.dev/issue/58458)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **testing: add Name to track file and line of test case declaration** [#52751](https://go.dev/issue/52751)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/net/quic: add QUIC implementation** [#58547](https://go.dev/issue/58547)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **builtin: add abs to get absolute value of numbers( integer and float pointers)** [#60623](https://go.dev/issue/60623)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **context: enable first class citizenship of third party implementations (case when custom context needs to create is own done channel)** [#36448](https://go.dev/issue/36448)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **net/http: add path/regex based routing** [#38636](https://go.dev/issue/38636)
  - duplicate of #61410

  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **testing: a less error-prone API for benchmark iteration** [#48768](https://go.dev/issue/48768)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
